snippet: A flurry of erroneous orders placed by an Indian broker sent the country’s top stock market tumbling briefly on Friday.
abstract: Trading on India's National Stock Exchange is briefly halted after a flurry of erroneous orders set off a rapid tumble.
lead_paragraph: A flurry of erroneous orders placed by an Indian broker sent the country’s top stock market tumbling briefly on Friday.

headline.main: Erroneous Orders Lead to Trading Halt in India
headline.print_headline: Erroneous Orders Lead To Trading Halt In India
